text:
That error message simple closes the current connection. Subsequent requests will be processed normally.

Given that this message indicates a faulty client, it is more likely the client continues to sent invalid requests which won't appear in the logs as DEBUG level logging is not enabled by default.

We need more information to investigate this report. Steps to reproduce would be ideal. A tcpdump and associated Tomcat logs for a series of failed requests may be sufficient. Without further information this issue will eventually be closed as WORKSFORME.
